com.linecorp.armeria.client.retry

Interface Backoff

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBackoff, BackoffWrapper
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface Backoff
    Control back off between attempts in a single retry operation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default <T> Optional<T> as(Class<T> backoffType)
      Undecorates this Backoff to find the Backoff which is an instance of the specified backoffType.
      static Backoff exponential(long initialDelayMillis, long maxDelayMillis)
      Returns a Backoff that waits an exponentially-increasing amount of time between attempts.
      static Backoff exponential(long initialDelayMillis, long maxDelayMillis, double multiplier)
      Returns a Backoff that waits an exponentially-increasing amount of time between attempts.
      static Backoff fixed(long delayMillis)
      Returns a Backoff that waits a fixed delay between attempts.
      long nextDelayMillis(int numAttemptsSoFar)
      Returns the number of milliseconds to wait for before attempting a retry.
      default Backoff withJitter(long minJitterMillis, long maxJitterMillis)
      Returns a Backoff that provides a delay that increases using full jitter strategy.
      default Backoff withJitter(long minJitterMillis, long maxJitterMillis, Supplier<Random> randomSupplier)
      Returns a Backoff that provides a delay that increases using full jitter strategy.
      default Backoff withMaxAttempts(int maxAttempts)
      Returns a Backoff which limits the number of attempts up to the specified value.
      static Backoff withoutDelay()
      Returns a Backoff that that will never wait between attempts.

    • Method Detail

      • withoutDelay

        static Backoff withoutDelay()
        Returns a Backoff that that will never wait between attempts.

      • fixed

        static Backoff fixed(long delayMillis)
        Returns a Backoff that waits a fixed delay between attempts.

      • exponential

        static Backoff exponential(long initialDelayMillis,
                           long maxDelayMillis)
        Returns a Backoff that waits an exponentially-increasing amount of time between attempts.

      • exponential

        static Backoff exponential(long initialDelayMillis,
                           long maxDelayMillis,
                           double multiplier)
        Returns a Backoff that waits an exponentially-increasing amount of time between attempts.

      • nextDelayMillis

        long nextDelayMillis(int numAttemptsSoFar)
        Returns the number of milliseconds to wait for before attempting a retry.
        Parameters:
        numAttemptsSoFar - the number of attempts made by a client so far, including the first attempt and its following retries.
        Returns:
        the number of milliseconds to wait for before attempting a retry, or a negative value if no further retry has to be made.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if numAttemptsSoFar is equal to or less than 0

      • as

        default <T> Optional<T> as(Class<T> backoffType)
        Undecorates this Backoff to find the Backoff which is an instance of the specified backoffType.
        Parameters:
        backoffType - the type of the desired Backoff
        Returns:
        the Backoff which is an instance of backoffType if this Backoff decorated such a Backoff. Optional.empty() otherwise.

      • withJitter

        default Backoff withJitter(long minJitterMillis,
                           long maxJitterMillis)
        Returns a Backoff that provides a delay that increases using full jitter strategy.

      • withJitter

        default Backoff withJitter(long minJitterMillis,
                           long maxJitterMillis,
                           Supplier<Random> randomSupplier)
        Returns a Backoff that provides a delay that increases using full jitter strategy.

      • withMaxAttempts

        default Backoff withMaxAttempts(int maxAttempts)
        Returns a Backoff which limits the number of attempts up to the specified value.
